item.title: Error i can't fix?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Replace:

if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrim")) { return 70; if (ItemName.startsWith("Magic Cape")) { return 99; return 1;

With:

if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrim")) { return 70; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Magic Cape")) { return 99; } return 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Error i can't fix?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

hey, i got this error when adding skillcapes.

client.java:26747: illegal start of expression public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

DO NOT SAY ADD A } ABOVE IT BECAUSE THERE IS! I’VE TRIED TO ADD MORE BUT THEN I GET LIKE 19-100 ERRORS.

This is the code

[code] return 1;
}
public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Granite”)) {
return 50;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Torags hammers”) || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks

greataxe")) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Strength Cape”)) {
return 99;
}
return 1;
}
public int GetCLMagic(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Magic Cape”)) {
return 99;
return 1;
}
public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Karil”)) {
return 70;
}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Range Cape”)) {
return 99;
}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Crystal”)) {
return 90;
}
return 1;
}
public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Hp Cape”)) {
return 99;
}else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
}
return 1;
}[/code]

Read full topic
